description:
gc: fix bug introduced earlier

Apparently l and $1 were the same register on Linux.
On the other systems, the compiler caught it.

messages.text:
Hello ken2 (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=22d5710cb088 ***

gc: fix bug introduced earlier

Apparently l and $1 were the same register on Linux.
On the other systems, the compiler caught it.

R=ken2
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 5654061: gc: fix bug introduced earlier
